meaning_str.bing:
n. 因特网；国际互联网
网络. 网际网路；网络；国际互联网络

网际网路；网络；国际互联网络

互联网；因特网；国际互联网

1.en: He said the city network to the Internet to see, thank you, if you are the one.
1.cn: 就说在同城网网上看到的，谢谢，非诚勿扰。

2.en: Talking from my point of view, if I hadn't had an internet connection, I wouldn't even be able to do my homework.
2.cn: 以我的观点，如果我没有联网，我甚至不能做家庭作业。

3.en: When he was asked if he ever expected the Internet to become so popular, Dr. Cerf said the number was a surprise.
3.cn: 当有人问瑟夫是否料到因特网变得如此普及时，瑟夫博士回答说这一数字令人始料不及。

0.en: The Internet's so negative. I try to avoid it.
0.cn: 互联网阴暗负面，我尽量不看呢。

1.en: And I think Internet must find the missing part.
1.cn: 我认为，互联网必须找到那个缺失的部分。

2.en: And also lot of the traditional business hate the Internet, because they destroy their business.
2.cn: 而许多传统企业讨厌互联网，因为互联网毁掉了他们的生意。

3.en: But what the rest is that why Internet companies always worry and worry?
3.cn: 但是为什么互联网公司总是担忧？

4.en: Yeah, but we use the Internet to study as well, Mr. Matthews.
4.cn: 是啊，但是我们也用互联网学习啊，马修斯老师。

5.en: Everybody believe that Internet has done great things to the world.
5.cn: 每个人都相信互联网为世界做出了伟大的贡献。

6.en: Internet, a part of the century in the past 20 years, was pretty successful, but one thing that is very strange (is) that I found that very few Internet companies can survive peacefully and healthily for more than 3 years.
6.cn: 过去20年，互联网非常成功，是我发现一个非常奇怪的事情，很少有互联网公司能健康、平静地活过3年。

7.en: Uh, just one other matter. I want to talk about taxation of Internet commerce.
7.cn: 还有一件事，我想谈谈互联网商务的税收问题。

8.en: If they look at the Internet, they're gonna think we're pretty ridiculous.
8.cn: 如果他们研究互联网的话，他们会觉得我们很可笑。

9.en: But she did dump you. Grow up, Raj. There's no place for truth on the Internet.
9.cn: 事实是她甩你啊。拉杰，醒醒吧，互联网上无事实。

10.en: But there is the internet and YouTube has proven to be a driving force for world pop.
10.cn: 我们有互联网，油管，已经证明是世界流行音乐的驱动力。

11.en: No, we turned our stereo down by sending a signal around the world via the internet.
11.cn: 不是，我们通过互联网走了地球一圈发送了一个命令把音响关小的。

12.en: Hey, what's going on? Internet's been down for half an hour. Also, Sheldon may be a robot.
12.cn: 嘿，过得怎么样？互联网瘫痪半个小时了。还有，谢尔顿可能是机器人。

13.en: Whether we like it or not, in the past 20 years, Internet has launched a huge impact to the human lives.
13.cn: 无论你是否喜欢，过去20年，互联网对人类社会产生了巨大的影响。

14.en: That means most of the Internet companies can only have honey days, honey weeks, they don't have even honey months.
14.cn: 这意味着大部分互联网公司只有“蜜日”“蜜周”，他们甚至没有蜜月。

15.en: Alright, Internet is amazing. Before I came here, searching on the Alibaba Internet, the e-commerce site, we found a stamp which is (in)1948, Hannover Messe Export.
15.cn: 互联网很奇妙，在我来这里之前，我在阿里巴巴电子商务网上，我们找到一枚1948年汉诺威梅西出口纪念邮票。

16.en: Olny(Only when) clicks and motors can work together, Internet company can survive, can live happily for next 30 years.
16.cn: 只有当鼠标和水泥结合时，互联网公司才能活下来，才能开心地活30年。

17.en: Internet purveyors have, for far too long, in my opinion, enjoyed the benefits of no taxation. I find this to be unfair.
17.cn: 在我看来，互联网供应商已经享受了太久的无税收福利，我认为这不公平。

18.en: Now what are historians in the future gonna use to help determine who we were? The Internet and my frozen brain.
18.cn: 那将来的历史学家会用什么来确定我们现在的样子呢？互联网和我的冷冻的大脑。

19.en: Today I come back again. The reason that I come back again, is trying to find the important missing part of the Internet business.
19.cn: 今天我又回来了。我回来的原因，是要找到互联网经济缺失的那重要一部分。
